DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitation Women Following Treatment Gynaecological Cancer ; Randomized , Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: Previous study show gynaecological cancer patient may suffer psychological physiological long term side-effects . Cancer surgery , radiotherapy chemotherapy may result physical symptom like gastro-intestinal problem relate pelvic pain ( White , 2008 ) . The person quality life may also influence finished cancer treatment may manifest physical psychological problem fatigue ( subjective experience fatigue lack energy ) ( Vistad et al. , 2007 ) , anxiety depression , sleep problem fear relapse ( Lagana et al. , 2001 , Wenzel et al. , 2002 , Hodginson , 2007 ) . The concept quality life something different operationalized define across different study . In present study quality life define global- health relate quality life . The physical psychological after-effects treatment also influence social function , hence ability get back work ( Boer et al. , 2009 ) . It generally agree high proportion woman work age come back work undergone cancer treatment . The woman 's experience returning work , accord Kennedy et al . ( 2007 ) , unknown area cancer research . Previous research show participation educational- , counselling- physical training group may positive effect quality life woman treat gynaecological cancer . As far know , however , randomize control study measure compare effect educational counsel intervention versus physical training group woman 's self-reported quality life cop . The purpose study therefore evaluate compare effect educational- counselling group physical train group woman 's self report quality life cop . The present study collaboration Haukeland University Hospital ( HUH ) , Bergen University College , University Agder , University Stavanger , Stavanger University Hospital Sørlandet Hospital . The study carry 2009 2013 . The participant diagnose treated gynaecological cancer January 2007 - January 2012 received/will receive information letter inform consent per post regular follow-up appointment Hospitals . All woman fulfil inclusion criterion finish treatment HUH January 2007 January 2012 invited/will invite participate present study . At Stavanger University Hospital Sørlandet Hospital patient finish treatment form 2008 invited participate present study . This intervention study randomize control design : 1 ) Educational counsel group , 2 ) Physical training group , 3 ) Control group , three repeat measure pre- intervention , post-intervention 1-year follow-up . The educational counselling group one session week period seven week . The physical training group two session week 16 week , focus strength endurance training . The control group follow standard post-treatment procedure specific Hospitals .
DOC.criteria: Women finish treatment curative purpose independent stage cancer , type gynaecological cancer , previous gynaecological cancer Meet certain physical functioning criterion ( Specified ; manage walk 3.1 mile per hour , lie rise floor ) To willing participate study period 1 year agree participate specify condition accord consent form Not significant amnesic symptom Women diagnosis include far criterion 3 fulfil
